data.text: Please wait for the roles to be assigned

data.message:
**Welcome to the GolmiEval Task!** Describe the highlighted piece on the board on the 
right so that another person could **uniquely** identify it. 
When in doubt, click on a piece to find out if that's your target.
Here's a little help: you can reference pieces according to this legend
the V letter at the very right upper corner
**You need to send at least one message before you can move on.** Remember to press enter to send your description
the purple X letter close to f green shape
**You need to send at least one message before you can move on.** Remember to press enter to send your description
the grey U letter between the pink f shape and the U letter. Respectively on the right and left side
**You need to send at least one message before you can move on.** Remember to press enter to send your description
The electric blue N letter almost in the center of the square
**You need to send at least one message before you can move on.** Remember to press enter to send your description
The first red X letter starting from the bottom
The first brown X letter starting from the bottom right corner
the brown T letter starting from the bottom right corner
the blue navy L letter. right side of the square.
the Y letter between the brown and the green L shapes.
Still 5 boards to go. You almost made it!
the orange L letter in the centre of the square.
**You need to send at least one message before you can move on.** Remember to press enter to send your description
the green  X letter at the bottom right corner.
the light blue Y letter between the light blue Z and V shapes.
The pink L letter at the bottom right corner.
That was the last one 🎉 🎉 thank you very much for your time! I really appreciate your help.
The room is closing, see you next time 👋
The room is closing, see you next time 👋
